snippet.title: The Case of the Golden Idol - Announcement Trailer - Future Games Show Gamescom 2022
snippet.description: The Case of the Golden Idol is a dynamic detective game for proper super sleuths, which is coming to PC in 2022. A demo for the game dropped during the show, which you can check out on the official Future Games Show Steam page.
